title: Real tiger bread
ingredients: ['360g plain white flour', '1/4 pint or 8 tablespoons milk', '4 tablespoons water', '2 tablespoons yeast (active) or 1 packet', '1 tablespoon sesame seed oil', '1 tablespoon cooking oil', '4 tablespoons sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons rice flour (corn flour)', '4 tablespooons milk']
